website_summaries.verdict: Cymbal separators and a reinforced bottom help set this cymbal bag apart from its competitors.
pros: Protect six cymbals measuring up to 24" across
Five padded cymbal separators and nylex lining
Large pocket with built-in organizer and smaller pocket
Metal snaps, ID tag, and reinforced bottom
Outer pocket large enough to hold tablet
cons: Arm strap is not terribly comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag works well, especially if you get the back pack strap accessory too. I did not use this for cymbals. I bought it to protect my captain america shield, while at a comic con. I have been gathering signatures from various MCU actors and I needed a way to carry it around all day and keep it protected as well. It has plenty of cushioning on the inside. The front pouches had plenty of room for other things so I didn't need to bring a separate bag or my purse. I strongly advise getting the backpack straps with it. It made it much easier to carry around the convention center, which I did for a good 14 hours.
customer_reviews.author: j gun

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great cymbal bag without having to break the bank. Very protective, and nice dividers inside the bag, and nice storage pouch in front. The zippers are super solid too. Great for a player who uses big pies. I throw my 24” K Light Ride, 22 K Light Ride, and 16” K Light Hats in there with no problem. And sometimes I carry an additional 20” cymbal with me in there as well. Love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: JustinSJ

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Cymbal Bag PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: This bag rocks! Was a gift for my son to use when he gigs and WOW it’s awesome. He used to use a gym style bag with towels between the cymbals but not anymore. This bag was just the ticket for him and the best part are the dividers that keep each cymbal safe and secure in it’s own pocket. The reinforced bottom is great and the handles are sturdy as can be. Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: DXTAC

customer_reviews.title: Good price and made well
customer_reviews.text: Bag is perfect for my needs. I'm a weekend player these days and I handle my own gear so I dont need a case that can handle being thrown around and abused. I've only had the case a few months now but I think it will last several years.
customer_reviews.author: kungfujoe

customer_reviews.title: Durable and professional looking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and value for the price. This cymbal bag is durable, looks nice and does a good job of keeping the cymbals apart so they don’t scratch each other during transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Ajarndontree

customer_reviews.title: Fits full size Cap Shield perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I’m a cosplayer, not a drummer, so I bought this bag for my 24” full size Captain America shield. The shield fits perfectly and I put my accessories in the front pocket to keep everything together. Everything feels very protected and the bag is sturdy to carry. I’m excited to travel with it and I feel confident that my shield is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: well made, great pockets, love this BAG
customer_reviews.text: Cymbal bag, has from pocket for music books, a zipper for sticks, a place for pens, a place for everything. handles or strap to carry. no smaller pockets for high hats.. but it can hold 7 cybmal. We had Zilgden and it ripped out in 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Murray

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This larger case for cymbals certainly does the job, but the bottom of the bag has started to crack open already. I treat it fairly well and have gigged occasionally since purchasing it (about 6 months). So needless to say, the tear kind of bugged me when I first saw it. For how much I paid, I would probably say do some research into other cymbal bags on Amazon that might be a little higher in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nickdolan13

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who carries her cymbals to church every week. So far the bag meets her needs very well. The cushioned dividers, the strap seem to be of good quality and she likes the extra pockets. I like the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. At a glance, it’s perfect for any situation.
customer_reviews.author: B. Athey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cymbal bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag carries my collection of Heartbeat cymbals. 24” ride, 21 and 20” crashes, 16” hats and 10” splash. Nice padded dividers keep them from ever touching each other.
customer_reviews.author: OC MtnBkr

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all those cymbals!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag! Fit's our largest cymbals well and the shoulder strap makes it very easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Tinat702

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag, holds multiple cymbals and accessories.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to carry a 22 heavy ride, 3 assorted cymbals, hihats and a splash. They all fit nicely in the bag. I have only had it for a month or so, so I'm not sure how it will stand up to gigging (I'll update in the summer or when something notable happens). So far, I'm very happy with it. Reasonably rugged (if you need super rugged get a hard case), and the side pouch is very useful to keep spare parts and the ever needed extra drum key.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: This thing is mega large and high quality. Placed ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is mega large and high quality. Placed all my cymbals in here for a recent move and had no issues toting it around. Definitely well made and padded for cymbal protection. Worth the $ spent IMO
customer_reviews.author: Marcus E.

customer_reviews.title: Cymbal Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag so far. It has a lot of room, fits all sizes of cymbals with some extra stuff and make it easy to carry everything in one bag. This is a great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: swilson1237

customer_reviews.title: Cool cymbal bag but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the outside pockets and dividers. I didn’t like that it’s Not offered in a 22” Size.
customer_reviews.author: John Rush

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Not a great option if you are looking to store more then two cymbals. Flimsy handles. Zippers are good but not enough interior coushing comparing other brand we have purchased after returning this one
customer_reviews.author: dzemgirl

customer_reviews.title: Protection and Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my nephew for Christmas , he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built with nice features
customer_reviews.text: Well built, big, handy pockets. Solid shoulder strap. Dividers are nice.
customer_reviews.author: ffernandes87

customer_reviews.title: sturdy cymbal bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Protecc Cymbal bag is well constructed and designed for my needs. It arrived quickly, and have no complaints. Scott
customer_reviews.author: interdrum

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product for protecting your cymbals and makes it easier to transporting them. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John BNY

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and holds a 24"
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag. Very roomy. It has little pockets to hold pens and tablet. It can comfortably hold a pint of whiskey, but you didn't hear that from me. I have not used it too much, so durability cannot be accurately rated, but I gave it 5 stars due to the ruggedness of the zipper. Cheap zippers suck. Love that it can hold a 24" ride.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpy Gravy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great quality and a lot of room for everything you need. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christian A.

customer_reviews.title: More for your money. Lots of room!!!
customer_reviews.text: All this fits in Bag and its not tight. Ride, 2 crash, hats (separate compartments) splash, china, ipad, sticks, clutch. See pic. I did not buy logo bags as they are not bag mfgs and it seams u get more bag for your money with Protex
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

product_meta.title: Protec Deluxe 24” 6-Pack Cymbal Bag with Padded Dividers and Puncture Resistant Bottom
product_meta.description: Protec's C232 deluxe gig bag protects 6 cymbals up to 24" and features 5 padded dividers, large exterior pocket with built-in organizer, rugged 600D nylon exterior with high-density 10mm padding, soft padded nylex lining, strong metal hardware, padded carry handle, removable padded shoulder strap, and reinforced bottom.
feature_bullets: 5 padded cymbal separators and soft non-abrasive nylex lining
Rugged 600D nylon exterior featuring high-density 10mm padding and a padded handle wrap
Removable thickly padded shoulder strap with strong metal snaps and an ID tag
Reinforced puncture-resistant bottom and soft non-abrasive nylex lining
Large 13 x 17 x 1.25" pocket with built-in organizer along with a smaller gusseted pocket on the front

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
